title: Fritz Leiber's Fafhrd and the Gray Mouser
description: Since their first appearance in 1939, Fritz Leiberâ€™s Fafhrd and the Gray Mouser have ranked among the most beloved characters in fantasy. Their rollicking adventures in the fantastic land of Nehwon have influenced the work of some of the best in modern fantasy, including Michael Moorcock, Terry Pratchett and countless others.
author: Howard Chaykin
